amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 116-411 to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to prioritize the hiring of veterans and related preference eligible individuals, including disabled veterans and widows or widowers of veterans, for positions within the Transportation Security Administration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 116-411 to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to prioritize the hiring of veterans and related preference eligible individuals, including disabled veterans and widows or widowers of veterans, for positions within the Transportation Security Administration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cisneros amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 399 - 1 (Roll no. 87).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Cisneros.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cisneros amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 399 - 1 (Roll no. 87).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
